about.title: About Us
about.description: The Robotics & AV Club is dedicated to building cutting-edge robots for competitions, creating energy-efficient designs, developing smart automation solutions, and promoting sustainability through technology.
about.mission: Building smarter, greener solutions for tomorrow

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: Centre of excellence in Mechanical Engineering Education, Research and Innovations for Sustainable Development

missionPoints: Build ecosystem for academic excellence and innovative research
Foster collaborations with institutes and industries
Contribute towards holistic and sustainable development
